name: 王泰典
objective: 透過土壤力學的觀念解說，使學生熟悉大地工程基本原理，並具備各項計算的技巧。
schedule:
W01: Introduction
W02: Origin of soil and grain size
W03: Weight-volume relationships, plasticity and structure of soil
W04: Engineering classification of soil
W05: Soil compaction
W06: Permeability
W07: Seepage
W08: Midterm #1
W09: In-situ stresses
W10: Stresses in a soil mass
W11-12: Compressibility of soil
W13: Midterm #2
W14-15: Shear strength of soil
W16: Lateral earth pressure
W17: Solpe stability
W18: Final
scorePolicy:
Attendance 10%
Evaluating items: presence and response
Homework 45%
Evaluating items: correctness and submitting timing
Midterms 30% (15% for each)
Final examination 15%
materials: Textbook: Das, B. M. (2006), Principles of Geotechnical Engineering, 6th edition.
